item.title: Welcome to Our New Updates Section
item.description:
We’re excited to introduce our new Updates section! This is where we’ll be sharing the latest news, announcements, and developments from our team.

What’s New

  • Basic website updates
  • Fixed navigation bar display issues
  • Fixed icon errors
  • Added a dedicated Updates section for general news

Coming Soon

  • First meeting: 15th September
  • Upcoming Documentation Features
  • More detailed roadmap

Stay tuned for more updates!
